Mexican.title: Authentic Tacos al Pastor
Mexican.instructions: Marinate pork with achiote paste, orange juice, vinegar, and spices for 2 hours. Cook on grill or skillet until done. Warm tortillas. Serve pork with pineapple, cilantro, onion, and lime wedges.

Mexican.title: Mole Poblano
Mexican.instructions: Toast chiles and remove seeds. Toast nuts and seeds. Sauté onion and garlic. Blend all ingredients except chicken. Cook sauce for 2 hours. Add chicken and simmer for 1 hour. Serve with rice and tortillas.

Mexican.title: Enchiladas Verdes
Mexican.instructions: Boil tomatillos and jalapeños. Blend with onion, garlic, cilantro, and salt. Fry tortillas briefly. Fill with chicken and roll. Place in baking dish. Cover with sauce and cheese. Bake at 350°F for 20 minutes. Serve with sour cream.

Mexican.title: Pozole
Mexican.instructions: Cook pork and hominy in water for 2 hours. Toast chiles and blend with garlic, onion, and spices. Add to pot and simmer for 30 minutes. Shred pork. Serve with cabbage, onion, radishes, lime, and oregano.

Mexican.title: Chiles Rellenos
Mexican.instructions: Roast peppers and remove skins. Make filling with beef, onion, garlic, and spices. Stuff peppers. Beat egg whites until stiff. Fold in yolks and flour. Dip peppers in batter and fry until golden. Serve with tomato sauce.

Mexican.title: Tamales
Mexican.instructions: Beat lard until fluffy. Mix masa with salt and baking powder. Add stock gradually. Beat into lard. Spread masa on husks. Add chicken and sauce. Fold and steam for 1 hour. Serve with salsa.

Mexican.title: Guacamole
Mexican.instructions: Mash avocados with lime juice and salt. Mix in remaining ingredients. Adjust seasoning. Serve immediately with tortilla chips.

Mexican.title: Churros
Mexican.instructions: Boil water, butter, and salt. Add flour and stir until smooth. Beat in eggs one at a time. Pipe into hot oil and fry until golden. Roll in cinnamon sugar. Serve with chocolate sauce.

Mexican.title: Mexican Ceviche
Mexican.instructions: Marinate fish in lime juice for 30 minutes. Add shrimp, vegetables, and seasonings. Mix well and chill for 1 hour. Serve with avocado and tortilla chips.

Mexican.title: Flan
Mexican.instructions: Caramelize sugar in ramekins. Beat eggs with milks, vanilla, and salt. Pour over caramel. Bake in water bath at 350°F for 45 minutes. Chill for 4 hours. Invert and serve.

Mexican.title: Carnitas
ingredients: 3 lbs pork shoulder, cut into chunks
Mexican.instructions: Marinate pork with citrus juices, garlic, and spices for 2 hours. Cook in lard until tender and crispy. Shred meat. Serve on tortillas with salsa, cilantro, and onion.

Mexican.title: Quesadillas
ingredients: Salsa and sour cream for serving
Mexican.instructions: Heat oil in skillet. Place tortilla and add cheese, chicken, and vegetables. Top with another tortilla. Cook until golden and cheese melts. Flip and cook other side. Cut into wedges and serve with salsa and sour cream.

Mexican.title: Sopa de Tortilla
Mexican.instructions: Fry tortilla strips until crispy. Blend tomatoes, onion, garlic, and chipotles. Cook in stock with spices for 20 minutes. Add tortilla strips. Serve with avocado, cheese, and cilantro.

Mexican.title: Elote (Mexican Street Corn)
Mexican.instructions: Grill corn until charred. Mix mayonnaise, sour cream, and lime juice. Brush corn with mixture. Sprinkle with cheese, spices, and cilantro. Serve immediately.

Mexican.title: Horchata
Mexican.instructions: Soak rice, almonds, and cinnamon in water overnight. Blend until smooth. Strain through cheesecloth. Add sugar and vanilla. Chill for 2 hours. Serve over ice with cinnamon garnish.

Mexican.title: Tres Leches Cake
Mexican.instructions: Bake cake with flour, baking powder, butter, sugar, eggs, and vanilla. Mix three milks. Poke holes in cake and pour milk mixture. Chill for 4 hours. Whip cream with sugar and vanilla. Frost cake and serve.

Mexican.title: Birria
ingredients: 3 lbs goat or beef, cut into chunks
Mexican.instructions: Toast chiles and remove seeds. Blend with vegetables, vinegar, and spices. Marinate meat for 2 hours. Cook in Dutch oven for 3 hours until tender. Shred meat. Serve in tortillas with onion, cilantro, and lime.

Mexican.title: Agua Fresca
ingredients: 4 cups fresh fruit (watermelon, cantaloupe, or mango)
Mexican.instructions: Blend fruit with water, sugar, and lime juice. Strain through fine mesh. Chill for 1 hour. Serve over ice with mint garnish.

Mexican.title: Churros con Cajeta
Mexican.instructions: Make churros as usual. Heat cajeta until warm. Drizzle over churros and sprinkle with pecans. Serve immediately.

Mexican.title: Pico de Gallo
Mexican.instructions: Mix all ingredients in bowl. Let sit for 30 minutes to blend flavors. Serve with tortilla chips or as topping for tacos.

Mexican.title: Quick Mexican Quesadillas
ingredients: Sour cream and guacamole for serving
Mexican.instructions: Heat butter in pan. Place tortilla, add cheese, chicken, and salsa. Top with second tortilla. Cook for 2-3 minutes per side until golden and cheese melts. Cut into wedges. Serve with sour cream and guacamole.

Mexican.title: Quick Guacamole
Mexican.instructions: Mash avocados with lime juice. Mix in onion, tomatoes, jalapeño, cilantro, and salt. Serve immediately with tortilla chips.

Mexican.title: Quick Mexican Rice
Mexican.instructions: Heat oil and cook onion until soft. Add garlic and rice. Cook for 2 minutes. Add tomatoes, broth, and spices. Bring to boil, then simmer for 15 minutes. Season with salt.

Mexican.title: Quick Fish Tacos
Mexican.instructions: Season fish with cumin, chili powder, salt, and pepper. Cook fish for 3-4 minutes per side. Warm tortillas. Mix sour cream with lime juice. Assemble tacos with fish, cabbage, and sour cream mixture. Garnish with cilantro.

Mexican.title: Quick Mexican Street Corn
Mexican.instructions: Grill corn until charred. Mix mayonnaise and sour cream. Brush corn with mixture. Sprinkle with cheese, chili powder, and lime juice. Garnish with cilantro.

Mexican.title: Quick Chicken Tacos
ingredients: Toppings: lettuce, tomato, cheese, sour cream
Mexican.instructions: Season chicken with cumin, chili powder, salt, and pepper. Cook chicken with onion and garlic for 5 minutes. Add lime juice. Warm tortillas. Serve chicken with desired toppings.

Mexican.title: Quick Mexican Bean Dip
Mexican.instructions: Heat refried beans. Layer in dish with sour cream, salsa, and cheese. Microwave until cheese melts. Top with green onions. Serve with tortilla chips.

Mexican.title: Quick Mexican Ceviche
Mexican.instructions: Marinate fish in lime juice for 10 minutes. Add onion, jalapeños, cilantro, and salt. Mix well. Serve with tortilla chips.

Mexican.title: Quick Mexican Breakfast Burrito
Mexican.instructions: Cook chorizo until browned. Add hash browns and cook until crispy. Scramble eggs with salt and pepper. Warm tortillas. Fill with chorizo mixture, eggs, cheese, and salsa. Roll and serve.

Mexican.title: Quick Mexican Salsa Verde
Mexican.instructions: Boil tomatillos and jalapeños for 5 minutes. Blend with onion, garlic, cilantro, salt, and lime juice. Serve immediately or store in refrigerator.

Mexican.title: Quick Mexican Nachos
Mexican.instructions: Layer chips with beans and cheese. Microwave until cheese melts. Top with jalapeños, sour cream, guacamole, and salsa. Garnish with cilantro. Serve immediately.

Mexican.title: Quick Mexican Enchiladas
Mexican.instructions: Warm tortillas. Fill with chicken and roll. Place in baking dish. Cover with sauce and cheese. Bake at 375°F for 15 minutes. Top with sour cream and cilantro.

Mexican.title: Quick Mexican Tostadas
Mexican.instructions: Spread beans on tostada shells. Top with chicken, lettuce, tomato, and cheese. Add sour cream and cilantro. Serve immediately.

Mexican.title: Quick Mexican Churros
Mexican.instructions: Boil water, butter, and salt. Add flour and stir until smooth. Beat in eggs. Pipe into hot oil and fry until golden. Roll in cinnamon sugar. Serve hot.

Mexican.title: Quick Mexican Pozole
Mexican.instructions: Cook pork in broth for 15 minutes. Add hominy, onion, garlic, and spices. Simmer for 10 minutes. Season with salt and pepper. Serve with toppings.

Mexican.title: Quick Mexican Flautas
ingredients: Sour cream and salsa for serving
Mexican.instructions: Fill tortillas with chicken and cheese. Roll tightly. Fry until golden and crispy. Serve with sour cream and salsa.

Mexican.title: Quick Mexican Sopes
Mexican.instructions: Warm sope shells. Spread with beans. Top with chicken, lettuce, tomato, and cheese. Add sour cream. Serve immediately.

Mexican.title: Quick Mexican Molletes
Mexican.instructions: Split rolls and toast. Spread with beans. Top with cheese. Broil until cheese melts. Add pico de gallo and cilantro. Serve hot.

Mexican.title: Quick Mexican Chilaquiles
Mexican.instructions: Heat salsa verde. Add tortilla chips and chicken. Cook for 3 minutes. Top with cheese, sour cream, and cilantro. Serve immediately.

Mexican.title: Quick Mexican Gorditas
Mexican.instructions: Warm gordita shells. Fill with beans, beef, lettuce, tomato, and cheese. Top with sour cream. Serve immediately.

Mexican.title: Quick Mexican Tamales
Mexican.instructions: Spread masa on wrappers. Add chicken and sauce. Wrap tightly. Steam for 15 minutes. Top with cheese and serve.

Mexican.title: Quick Mexican Menudo
Mexican.instructions: Cook tripe in broth for 20 minutes. Add hominy, onion, garlic, and oregano. Simmer for 10 minutes. Season with salt and pepper. Serve with lime wedges.

Mexican.title: Quick Mexican Agua Fresca
Mexican.instructions: Blend fruit with water, sugar, and lime juice. Strain and chill. Serve over ice.

Mexican.title: Quick Mexican Paletas
Mexican.instructions: Blend fruit with water, sugar, and lime juice. Pour into molds. Freeze for 4 hours. Serve frozen.
